Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects of using road closures on reptile populations. This study was in Canada.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
BEHAVIOUR (1 STUDY)

Use (1 study): One replicated study in Canada found that closed roads were not used more by Blandingâ€™s turtles than unclosed roads.
